cast.overview: Don Sallust is the minister of the King of Spain. Being disingenuous, hypocritical, greedy and collecting the taxes for himself, he is hated by the people he oppresses. Accused by The Queen, a beautiful princess Bavarian, of having an illegitimate child to one of her maids of honor, he was stripped of his duties and ordered to retire to a monastery.
cast.title: Delusions of Grandeur
cast.character: Dona Juana, first lady of the queen

cast.overview: Asterix and Obelix depart on an adventure to complete twelve impossible tasks to prove to Caesar that they are as strong as the Gods. You'll roar with laughter as they outwit, outrun, and generally outrage the very people who are trying to prove them "only human".
cast.title: The Twelve Tasks of Asterix

details.biography:
Alice Sapritch (29 July 1916 – 24 March 1990) was a French film actress. She appeared in 66 films between 1950 and 1989.

Source: Article "Alice Sapritch" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Alice Sapritch
